<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/api/users/{emailAddress}/send-verification-code"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

Sends a verification code to the user's email if the current code is expired or does not exist.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
